title: Open Myanmar Initiative is ...
text:
Open Myanmar Initiative is ... 
 A nonprofit organization with the vision of promoting the right to information and education - an imperative to get each and every citizen engaged in Myanmar's transition towards the future where peace prevails and democracy prospers.

title: Open Myanmar Initiative is ...
text: A horizontal organization of nonpartisan and independent individuals working together in participatory manner.

title: Open Myanmar Initiative is ...
text: Open to collaborate transparently with any organization or individual that does not support, promote or involve in any violence.

title: Vision
text: We believe that all citizens of Myanmar are endowed with inherent human rights and dignity, and are entitled to the unalienable rights of education and information.

title: Mission
text:
To bridge the socio-economic inequalities in Myanmar society; to collaborate with international community so as to support national development through research and training
To rally citizens' active support in peace and reconciliation processes by deepening awareness of democratic values and human rights among citizens.

title: Processes
text:
Conducting research and publishing findings on the democratic transformation of the Republic of the Union of Myanmar 
Providing training, organizing seminars and initiating civic education programs in order to support aforementioned efforts

title: Address
text: No - 133, ThuMingalar Road, KayTuMarlar Avenue, 4 ward, South Okkalapa Township, Yangon
